alert.note: Alert for Santa Clarita Valley; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 28 at 3:12AM PST until January 29 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Ventura County Interior Valleys and Ventura County Coastal Valleys. * WHEN...Until noon PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Major roadways that could be impacted by the gusty winds include Interstate 5, as well as Highways 14 and 126.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Clarita Valley; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys
